title: Aim Assist Preset
description: Defines an aim assist preset that configures how aim assist behaves for a player. Presets specify which categories to use for different items and hands, as well as exclusion lists.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of the aim assist preset file.

fields.title: Aim Assist Preset
fields.description: The root object containing the preset definition.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The namespaced identifier for this preset (e.g., 'minecraft:aim_assist_default').

fields.title: Item Settings
fields.description: Map of item identifiers to the aim assist category to use when holding that item.

fields.title: Category
fields.description: The aim assist category identifier to use for this item.

fields.title: Default Item Settings
fields.description: The aim assist category to use for items not explicitly listed in item_settings.

fields.title: Hand Settings
fields.description: The aim assist category to use when the player has an empty hand.

fields.title: Exclusion Settings
fields.description: Blocks and entities that should be excluded from aim assist targeting.

fields.title: Blocks
fields.description: Array of block identifiers to exclude from targeting.

fields.title: Entities
fields.description: Array of entity identifiers to exclude from targeting.

fields.title: Liquid Targeting List
fields.description: Array of item identifiers that should be able to target liquid blocks (water, lava).
